sentences.en: A commercial photocopier was bought and installed in the mobile unit.
sentences.cn: 商业复印机也已购买并安装在了移动设备中.

sentences.en: Ever wondered the gender of a photocopier? Wonder no more, the answers to all your gender questions are here.
sentences.cn: 是否想知道复印机的性别?不用再苦恼了，所有关于性别问题的答案都在这里。

sentences.en: If the photocopier stops working just give it a clout.
sentences.cn: 如果那部影印机停止运转的话就敲它一下.

sentences.en: Our photocopier is in continual need of running repairs.
sentences.cn: 我们的复印机经常需要检修.

sentences.en: Printer, Fax Machine, Timer, Photocopier, Typewriter, PC Equipment, Graph Plotter Time Recorder.
sentences.cn: 打印机, 传真机, 计时器, 复印机, 打字机, 电脑设备, 绘图仪,列表机.

sentences.en: Rudy: I'd like to, but the photocopier is out of order.
sentences.cn: 鲁迪: 我想, 但影印机出故障了.

sentences.en: Sam: Well you can't do that on our photocopier.
sentences.cn: 山姆: 那你可不能用我们这台影印机.

sentences.en: That photocopier is always getting jammed up.
The company describes its process as a “human photocopier”.
sentences.cn: 该公司形容这种工序为“人体复印机。”

sentences.en: The fax machine is adjacent photocopier in the newsroom.
sentences.cn: 新闻室中传真机相邻著影印机.

sentences.en: The mere rhythmic drone of a photocopier or the rumble from a hairdryer is enough to set her off.
sentences.cn: 即使是来自复印机的细微而有节律的嗡嗡声或吹风机的轰响都能让她无法自已。

sentences.en: The old photocopier is still useful, although book value is almost nothing.
sentences.cn: 这台旧复印机的账面价值已近于零, 但实际上仍然有用.

sentences.en: The photocopier has been busy all morning.

sentences.cn: 这台影印机影印效果不好。

sentences.en: The photocopier only work with a particular type of paper.
sentences.cn: 影印机只能使用专用纸.

sentences.en: The repair man have come to mend the photocopier.
sentences.cn: 修理工已经来修理这台影印了.

sentences.en: Yasmin: Yes, he said he's going to go for a multifunctional photocopier.
sentences.cn: 亚斯明: 知道.他说会买一部多功能影印机.

sentences.en: You have irreparably broken at least one client photocopier.
sentences.cn: 你搞坏过至少一台客户的影印机.

sentences.en: You've left your master in the photocopier.
sentences.cn: 你把原件留在影印机里了.

trans.tran_en: a machine that makes photographic copies of documents
